input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: My decision has a direct effect on penguin mood and penguin survival. Penguin mood has a direct effect on penguin survival. For those who choose to take the stairs, the probability of penguin death is 54%. For those who choose to take the elevator, the probability of penguin death is 49%. For those who choose to take the elevator, would it be less likely to see penguin death if I had taken the stairs?
